oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Wheat district runners up
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eleven young women, six standing and five sitting, are posed for a group portrait. One is holding a trophy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Athletes; Awards; Wheat (Tenn.)
Arnold, Sara; Butler, Frances; Cooper, Marion; Devaney, Billie Mae; Johnson, Earl; Johnson, Edna; King, Hope; Qualls, Fleta; Silva, Dora; Silva, Yvonne; Stinecipher, Bonita
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Standing from left to right are Marion Cooper, Hope King, Billie Mae Devaney, Frances Butler, Edna Johnson, and Earl Johnson. Sitting from left to right are Fleta Qualls, Dora Silva, Yvonne Silva, Bonita Stinecipher, and Sara Arnold.
On front of image, MED 289. The photo itself has a caption, Wheat-12th. district runners-up 1940; Harriman March; Adkisson photo in bottom right corner.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Oak Ridge Public Library, 1401 Oak Ridge Trpke, Oak Ridge, TN 37830 reference@oakridgetn.gov
